website_summaries.verdict: This is the perfect pair of bowling shoes for those of any skill level, allowing for a perfect slide, and at a good value.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors to suit any style
These are comfortable and heavily cushioned
Room to add insoles as desired
These provide a good slide, even for beginning bowlers
cons: Cannot be worn outside of the bowling alley as they will become damaged

customer_reviews.title: Not unhappy - just need to break them in a little more.
customer_reviews.text: Out of fairness, I’ll re-review after wearing three times to allow time to break these in. Shoes come bagged - not securely packaged in box or cushioning. I wear an 8 regular. Ordered 8. They are a tad wide and a tad too roomy - will have to wear really bulky socks, especially if they soften up and become more flexible. Inner cushion is adequate, but may need to add arch support. They are very stiff - even for new shoes - but this will hopefully change with use. Definitely want to wear padding (nice socks) that extend above top edge of back of the shoe until it loosens up.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyville

customer_reviews.title: excellent bowling shoes, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: so much more comfortable than the ones I got from the bowling alley pro shop. These are more cushioned and plenty of room for inserts without my feet falling out.
customer_reviews.author: J. More

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because the description states "Arch support and cushioning for ultimate comfort." There was no arch support and in fact there wasn't even a liner in the shoe so cushioning was not there. The front of the tongue is plastic and it digs into the front of my foot. I wore these around the house for a few days to see if they would get more comfortable, but I just couldn't wear them. I am returning them for a refund and have purchased a different bowling shoe that has more cushion and better flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Clements

customer_reviews.title: No breaking in - was able to slide right away.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I struggled all year on some crappy shoes that didn't slide. I threw them away! After 2 weeks bowling in these new shoes my average has gone up and I feel real confident as I approach the foul line that I won't stick or fall down. Comfortable too. Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and girly
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes very much, they are comfortable on the inside and sturdy on the outside and very cute and girly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... that they would not fit right but they fit perfect and look good really nice
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to order these that they would not fit right but they fit perfect and look good really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. They look exactly as pictured. I went a half size up from what I would normally buy and my toe touches the tip. I have not bowled with them yet. They fairly comfortable but a little small.
customer_reviews.author: DebF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes! Comfortable and awesome looking at the bowling alley!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Changed my mind the upper part of the shoe was loose and weird feeling ....

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine. The color part of the tongue rubs against my ankles. Otherwise, the shoes are good in all aspects.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would be more comfortable for my feet, kind of loose.. I put an insert in to make it fit better. Size 9

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: great fit. haven't tried them on the lanes yet. but so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bowling Shoe for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a great buy plus a very comfortable and sturdy shoe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Comfortable

customer_reviews.title: ... arch support in the shoe but I am still happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I thought there was arch support in the shoe but I am still happy with them. They are comfortable but I do not bowl any better.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Shoes and a clear plastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in a plastic bag, not a shoebox. Really! How are you supposed to gift that! Looks wide and heavier than the average bowling shoes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes look nice but took a little while to break in. Once broken in they are very comfortable and not overly stiff

customer_reviews.title: She has used them a couple times and she says they are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She has used them a couple times and she says they are comfortable and fit well.

customer_reviews.title: the material gapped along the sides
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a narrow foot and these shoes were gapping along the sides - not made correctly
